[rules]
rule_1: "Verify user role before deep technical answer."
rule_2: "Cite section anchors for procedural steps."
rule_3: "Offer next-step doc based on relationships mapping."
rule_4: "Never fabricate feature; flag uncertainty."
rule_5: "Use glossary for terminology; do not redefine."
rule_6: "Check prerequisites before suggesting advanced doc."
rule_7: "Return estimated difficulty/time if metadata present."

[metadata_fields]
fields: ["category", "audience", "difficulty", "time_required", "prerequisites", "related", "next_steps", "last_reviewed", "llm_validation"]
